title: Dallas police confirm HQ attack suspect shot by sniper is dead âÂ as it happened | US news | The Guardian
summary: suspect shot by sniper : condition unknown .
dallas police hq is now clear of suspect devices - police .

text: we are now wrapping up this blog and direct you to tom dart 's report from texas , which is available here .
before this blog closes , here 's a summary of today 's events in dallas .

a suspect who opened fire on the headquarters of dallas police and rammed his armored van into a police cruiser was shot dead by a swat team sniper , after he led police on a chase into the suburb of hutchins , texas .
police and the suspect exchanged fire after officers cornered him in the suburb and snipers shot out his van 's engine .
police chief david brown said the suspect eventually broke off intermittent negotiations after increasingly agitated and angry rants against police .
bomb robots inspected the van and found two pipe bombs within .
a package of pipe bombs and explosives blew up in police headquarters early saturday morning when a bomb robot attempted to it up .
police also found a second explosive device , which they destroyed in a controlled detonation .
no civilians police were injured or killed during the early morning assault in dallas or the ensuing gunfight in hutchins , despite dozens of rounds fired .
it was very helter-skelter for a long while , brown said , expressing relief and amazement that none were scathed even as buildings and cruisers were peppered with bullet holes .
this has been a very chilling moment .
the suspect is a white male , brown said , but he would not confirm that the suspect 's name was james boulware , as the suspect identified himself in a 911 call to police .
brown said the suspect rambled about losing custody of his child and about being named a terrorist by police .
brown said there have so far been no links to terrorism found , and that he could not confirm a motive .
brown did not rule out any scenario but said police believed there was only one suspect .
he said early witnesses likely reported multiple suspects because the one suspect opened fire from several locations and angles .

police were investigating the last known residence of boulware , and local media spoke to boulware 's father , who said his son had been upset over a custody battle with family members and that he had recently purchased a van .
geron also explains that mysterious blast we saw a bomb squad robot take while trying to open up access to the suspect 's van : the robot attempted a shotgun breach .
maj. max geron ( @ maxdpd ) actually was robot attempting shotgun breech of window .
# unsuccessful & prompted use of.50 cal .
# dallaspdshooting
police major max geron provides more detail of the bombs that went off at police headquarters , one when a robot tried to retrieve a sus package and a second in a controlled detonation by police .
maj. max geron ( @ maxdpd ) # breaking lots of shrapnel was included in the pipe bombs that exploded - screws , nails @ twitterid hq # dallaspdshooting
cbs reporter jd miles continues to tweet excerpts of his interview with the father of james boulware , the lead suspect in the shooting .
police have refrained from confirming the suspect 's identity pending a medical examination .
j.d .
miles ( @ jdmiles11 ) tearful but apologetic father says he 's sorry his son tried to kill dallas police officers in an attack overnight

documents.title: suspect confirmed dead
text: dallas police have confirmed that the suspect is dead inside the van , as suspected after more than five hours without contact with him .
they will not confirm whether or not the suspect is in fact james boulware , as he claimed to be to police earlier on saturday , pending medical examination .
dallas police depart ( @ dallaspd ) # breaking we can now confirm that the susp in the van is deceased but unable to confirm id pending med ex .
identification # dallaspdshooting
a quick video of the blast at the van , from dallas ' nbc affiliate .
nbc dfw ( @ nbcdfw ) update : chopper 5 captures explosions near the suspect vehicle used in attack on dallas pd hq
an armored car has rolled up to the van alongside officers , who are now stringing crime scene tape around the area .
screengrab of suspect van at 12.29pm local time .

-dfw meanwhile the father of suspect james boulware has continued speaking with local reporters , telling fox4 that his son was pushed to a snapping point over custody issues , and telling nbc that his son had bought the armored van last week from georgia .
j.d .
miles ( @ jdmiles11 ) father of # dallaspdshooting suspect james boulware on why his son shot at police .
first on cbs 11
stills of the controlled detonations at the armored van from local wfaa news .
wfaa tv ( @ wfaachannel8 ) the armored van was detonated just before noon .
two separate explosions the van itself still stands , and a robot and officers are stationed at either side of its doors , as is visible from this still of the cbs-dfw feed .
the suspect 's van at 12.07pm local time .
cbs-dfw

documents.title: pipe bombs found in van
text: dallas police major max geron says more explosive devices have been found in the van , perhaps explaining the blast of dust a few moments ago and the renewed action of the bomb robot .
maj. max geron ( @ maxdpd ) # breaking at least two additional pipe bombs found inside susp veh .
# dallaspdshooting
a cloud of dust just shot up around the suspect 's van after some kind of blast police have not said whether it was a controlled detonation or something else .
a bomb robot quickly rolled toward the van and back in the now empty parking lot .
more than five hours have gone by since police last had contact with the suspect .
arezow doost ( @ cbs11arezow ) 2 big booms just heard in hutchins .
you could feel it .
swat near suspect van # dallaspdshooting @ twitterid
at police headquarters , now a crime scene , investigators are finding bullet holes everywhere .
police chief david brown said that the department barely survived and that seeing how close so many officers came to death was chilling .
maj. max geron ( @ maxdpd ) # breaking inside @ twitterid hq riddled with bullet holes # dallaspdshooting
reporter jd miles of dallas ' cbs affiliate has interviewed the father of james boulware ( the suspect identified himself as boulware to police but authorities have yet to confirm him as such ) .
miles said boulware 's father wanted to talk and explain his son 's state of mind .
j.d .

miles ( @ jdmiles11 ) # dallaspdshooting suspect 's dad says his son was angry after custody battle with mom b/c ex wife in prison meanwhile jason whitely of local wfaa is at the dallas police headquarters , where shell casings are seemingly everywhere after this morning 's attack on the facility .
jason whitely ( @ jasonwhitely ) new : dozens of yellow markers at belleview & s lamar indicate bullet casings , evidence from # dallaspdshooting .

texas attorney general ken paxton has released a statement on the shooting , which reads : the attack on the dallas police department and its officers is a dangerous reminder of the unpredictable threats our men and women in law enforcement face every day .
led by chief david brown , the department 's response has been professional , working to end this situation as quickly , and as safely , as possible .

law enforcement , be they our local police officers , state law enforcement or federal agents , stand between law-abiding citizens , safe communities and those whose intentions are to destroy lives and our sense of security .
we support and appreciate their selfless and effective efforts to keep our cities and states safe .
police are no longer hovering up against the van , after having been briefly joined by a bomb robot .
the suspect 's van .
-dfw screengrab
officers are now right up alongside the van and peering through its windows , though it 's hard to tell what precisely they are doing from the distant camera feed .
a screengrab of cbs-dfw 's live feed in hutchins .
-dfw they have not yet said whether they have detonated the water charge .
a heavily armored police truck has just driven up into the parking lot and ushered out the other vehicles there besides the suspect 's van .

police major max geron has reiterated that police believe it likely that the suspect is dead , but adds that confirmation is premature until officers can safely inspect the van and determine his condition .
most of the police cars have moved far away from the suspect 's van , which is sitting in a restaurant parking lot in the suburb of hutchins .
a bomb robot briefly wheeled up to the van and then it also moved away .
major max geron says that police have been prepping for a safe detonation of the water charge .
arezow doost ( @ cbs11arezow ) fire department now here and will be using what 's called water charge to deactivate gun powder inside suspect van .
dallas police major max geron explains the device that officers have used to try to defuse any explosives that may be in the van .
they 've inserted the water charge through the windshield , which was blown off by sniper shots .
maj. max geron ( @ maxdpd ) .
@ cbs11arezow water charge uses container of water against explosive charge to disperse water and render black pwdr inert # dallaspdshooting

dallas police chief david brown announced earlier this morning that the suspect , who named himself as james boulware but whose identity he was cautious not to confirm , was shot by a swat team sniper .

although police say they can not yet confirm the suspect is james boulware , as he named himself during a 911 call after his attack on the dallas headquarters , they have been able to say that a man by that name has a record .
chief david brown has said that police had responded previously to three incidents of domestic violence involving a man with that name .

records show that a james boulware from the area had two charges of assault dismissed in the past two years , as well as a charge dismissed for aggravated assault with a deadly weapon more than a decade ago .
scott gordon , a reporter for the local nbc affiliate , has contacted boulware 's mother .
scottgordonnbc5 ( @ scottgordonnbc5 ) new : james boulware 's mother : `` we 've been dealing with this for a long time .
i 'm glad nobody else was hurt . ''
@ twitterid
police have gained access to the vehicle and are trying to defuse any explosives with what major max geron describes as a water charge .
geron adds that the bomb techs believe black powder [ was ] used in pipe bombs at the dallas police headquarters no c4 detected there .
before he cut off negotiations , the suspect had told police that he had c4 .
there 's still no word as to the suspect 's condition , who has n't made contact with police in over four hours .
media and even geron are saying they believe it likely that he is deceased .
maj. max geron ( @ maxdpd ) # breaking we 've opened the windshield and will utilize an explosive `` water charge '' to render any explosives inside inert # dallaspdshooting
dallas police major max geron clarifies what happened with the sus packages and two explosive devices .
maj. max geron ( @ maxdpd ) .
@ delgeo1 5 sus packages - 3 cleared , 2 explosives , 1 exploded on contact , other controlled detonation by eod .
# dallaspdshooting
police are trying to gain access to the van by firing at its windshield with high-powered rifles .
dallas police depart ( @ dallaspd ) one shot into susp veh windshield just went in with.50 cal .
# dallaspdshooting arezow doost ( @ cbs11arezow ) and another 3 pops just now making it 7 in the few minutes .
robot near suspect van .
# dallaspdshooting
late friday night a gunman opened fire at the dallas police headquarters from the inside of an armored van , spewing bullets at squad cars and into the building .
he rammed a police cruiser that moved to confront him , and then drove off .
no one was injured .
police cornered the van and a swat team sniper shot out its engine block with a high-powered rifle .
the suspect and officers traded fire , and chief david brown said that intermittent negotiations with the suspect eventually broke off after he became increasingly agitated .
eventually a sniper struck the suspect with a bullet , and police do not know whether he is alive or dead .
a package of pipe bombs and explosives blew up in police headquarters when a bomb robot attempted to it up .
police said that they found two devices but only one proved to be explosive upon contact .
an officer almost tripped over the explosive package in the dark , brown said .
bomb robots have inspected the suspect 's van but officers have refrained from approaching it for fear of explosives .
officers plan to shoot out the windshield to gain access to the interior of the van .
the suspect is a white male , brown said .
the man called 911 after having attacked the police headquarters , and identified himself as james boulware .
brown said he could not yet confirm whether the suspect is in fact boulware , but said the suspect ranted about losing custody of his child and about being named a terrorist by police .
brown said there have so far been no links to terrorism found , and that he could not confirm a motive .
brown did not rule out any scenario but said police believe there is only one suspect , and that witnesses initially reported as many as four only because the suspect shot from different locations .
it was very helterskelter for a long while , he said .
this has been a very chilling moment .
another video of the original confrontation on friday night , when the suspect rammed a police car and fired from various ports of the van out at officers and police headquarters .
two fbi agents are approaching the van , weapons drawn and at the ready .
a bomb robot , larger than the first , remains nearby at the scene , circling the van .
arezow doost ( @ cbs11arezow ) breaking : two fbi agents moving towards suspect van .
they have guns drawn .
# dallaspdshooting @ twitterid
an explanation of that blast which seemed to hit one of the bomb robots .
dallas police depart ( @ dallaspd ) # breaking @ twitterid attempted to take out the windshield of the susp veh with an explosive breach .
it had no effect # dallaspdshooting they will now use the same high-powered rifle that shot out the van 's engine block to try to take out the windshields and open access to the vehicle .
maj. max geron ( @ maxdpd ) # breaking @ twitterid will use the.50 rifle to strategically take out the windshield of the susp veh w/ 4 or more shots # dallaspdshooting
one of the bomb robots at the disabled van appears to be taken aback as it peers through the window with a camera .
dallas police chief david brown said that there would be controlled detonations to attempt to secure the van , but it 's not clear what happened here .
mireya cbs11 ( @ cbsmireya ) while @ twitterid is answering questions robot looks like it takes a hit while observing # dallaspdshooting van .
this has been a very chilling moment , brown says .
looking over bullet holes all over the police headquarters where people sat seconds before gunfire raises the hairs on the back of your neck pretty quickly , he says .
we literally dodged bullets .
he says that police are still holding out against any definitive descriptions of the crime .
we 're not at the point where we can rule out where other people , other things have happened .
we can just talk about what we have now , we have this one suspect in this van based on this robot .
no one is in custody , he says .
brown remains cautious about confirming the suspect by the name he gave .
we 're transitioning from an active shooting bomb scene to an investigative crime scene where we will come up with the answers to those questions , but we 're in the transition .
asked about the danger to civilians by the shooter , brown says it 's amazing that no officers or civilians were injured or killed .
it was very helterskelter for a long while , he says .
he did n't care that officers confronted him , he shot at officers just as freely as he was able to .
the suspect was very expressive of his desire to kill police , brown says .
he had planted packages to explode upon touch .
we had identified five different packages , only one that was planted with pipe bombs .
he says an officer almost tripped over it , this is in the middle of the night , and if he had touched on it he would n't have survived .
we barely survived the intent of this suspect .

brown says that officers exchanged gunfire with the suspect at hutchins , but that during negotiations the man became agitated and increasingly angry and threatening such that we were not only concerned for our officers there trying to contain this scene , being shot by him ¦ and the nearby neighborhoods taking rounds based on his violence .
he says that he believes it was the right call for the swat team to shoot at the suspect to stop his violence .
the suspect told police that he had c4 explosives in the van .
brown says we did n't want to call his bluff , and that they were taking due care and caution after the pipe bombs went off so quickly when a robot tried to recover them at police headquarters .
brown describes the 911 call that the suspect made to police .
the rant was about what we mentioned in the first briefing , first of all that police had called him to lose custody of his child .
secondly we had accused him of being a terrorist and he as a result was going to blow us up .
there was no mention of the gunshots toward the police facility or the attempts of killing an officer who had pulled up in front of him ¦ but that had already happened when he called 911 .
again he was rambling , you could tell there was quite a bit of anger .
brown says during negotiations the suspect would rant and get angry at police , and that the talks suddenly broke off on the suspect 's end .
he says that they do n't know a motive , and that from a history of custody issues and social media footprint of the suspect , he had expressed anger and even threatening remarks .
we have not confirmed the identity of this suspect , what we do know is it 's a white male and we 've got a height-weight description .
we 're not approaching the van until our bomb techs [ confirm the van is clear ] .
we had to make a call to disable the van and the best way for us to do that was to shoot out the engine block .
we have yet to confirm any of his rants about being accused as a terrorist .
it may have just been a rant .
we 're continuing to research his history so in the coming hours we hope to finalize there may be something now but as of right now we do n't have any nexus to terrorism .
he 's careful to qualify that they 're researching the name that the suspect gave , but that they have not yet confirmed that he is who he said he was .
initially he called 911 and left a long rant on our 911 tapes , and from that 911 call we got a phone call .
and then our negotiations called that number and that began our negotiations at the scene at hutchins .

documents.title: police : only one suspect
text: police believe there is only one suspect , and not as many as four as witnesses originally suggested .
what we believe to be true now is that this one suspect shot from different parts at the front of headquarters and witnesses may have seen different views .
¦ we 're still in the early stages of investigation [ but it seems his shots made ] it appear form witness perspectives , depending on where they were standing , that it was multiple suspects .
some officers say we 're very lucky , i believe we 're blessed that all our officers survived this ordeal .
there are bullet holes in squad cars where our officers were sitting , there are bullet holes in ¦ headquarters where our staff were sitting .
he says one person was saved simply by getting up to get a coke .
the second floor has bullet holes in it .
the information desk has bullet holes throguhotu .
just preliminarily we believe this suspect meant to kill officers and took time to discharge that weapon multiple times to accomplish their wanting to harm our officers .
when the van rammed the squad car that initially confronted this suspect , seconds of movement by our officers , seconds , had saved their lives .
if they had not moved ¦ they would n't have survived .

we have been concerned by security measures at our police facilities for some time , we recently increased overtime ¦ but this brings a completely new perspective to ensure that our officers , and people passing by [ and coming in ] ¦ we need to look at and rethink security .
he says that the fbi has been called to assist with the investigation , and that a bomb squad is going to check out the last known address of the suspect .
brown adds that police are investigating a call during which someone called disguising their voice and claiming to have a bomb .
all of our seven patrol stations have been searched and they have been cleared of any sus package at this time .
police headquarters is now transitioning to a crime scene and we are partnering with crime scene techs .

documents.title: suspect shot by sniper : condition unknown
text: he says that snipers shot at the suspect and struck him in the van , and that the robot was sent with a camera to try to confirm whether the suspect is deceased .
because the suspect during negotiations expressed that the van he was traveling in was rigged with explosives .
our officers are not approaching that vehicle but instead our bomb technicians are deploying the robot and plan to detonate specific areas around the van to ensure that it 's not rigged to explode .

documents.title: police chief briefing
text: police chief david brown is speaking : at 4.30am out bomb robot up a bag , a sus package at our [ headquarters ] .
this bag contained pipe bombs and as the robot up the bag thae bag exploded .
at 4.35am at the location ¦ where the suspect 's van is parked , our swat snipers shot out the engine block of the suspect vehicle with our 50-caliber sniper rifle .
at 4.38am a sus briefcase was reported at the dumpster at our north-east police substation .
we dispatched bomb techs to this location and this package was cleared and was not a bomb .
he says they then called additional bomb tech resources from federal and state allies .
there are now two robots inspecting the suspect 's van , which has been disabled by police using a high-powered rifle .
police say they 're concerned that there may be more explosives inside the vehicle .
arezow doost ( @ cbs11arezow ) another robot was brought in and checking out suspect vehicle # dallaspdshooting @ twitterid .
at the dallas police headquarters , the scan for bombs appears to be calming down , and officers are letting neighbors back into their homes .

maj. max geron ( @ maxdpd ) evacuees have been allowed back into their homes across from @ twitterid hq following a search for additional explosives # dallaspdshooting gabriel roxas ( @ cbs11gabriel ) anita grendahl shot these photos from her 7th floor apt # dallaspdshooting
dallas police major max meron has tweeted on a question that the local news outlets have been asking : whether the suspect is alive inside that van .
local news had reported that negotiations with the suspect had broken off in the last hour or so .
he also slightly clarifies reports about what was found at the police headquarters : two devices , one of which exploded .
maj. max geron ( @ maxdpd ) whether or not susp is inj or deceased , concern continues to be threat of explosives .
2 devices were found @ twitterid hq # dallaspdshooting
dallas police depart ( @ dallaspd ) # breaking dallas swat utilizing robot to examine the suspect vehicle .
still concerned about explosives # dallaspdshooting a swat vehicle makes its way toward a police staging area at the intersection of interstate 45 and e palestine street .
landis/ap
dallas police are moving in around the van right now , just a few minutes before a scheduled press conference , local cbs reporter arezow doost reports .
arezow doost ( @ cbs11arezow ) bomb squad robot surrounding suspect vehicle right now .
# dallaspdshooting @ twitterid
there is still an active investigation in dallas .
as of right now , i-45 remains shut down in the area of the standoff .
meanwhile , one of the sus packages has been cleared .
it did not contain explosives .

dallas police depart ( @ dallaspd ) # breaking sus package at northeast has been cleared and was not an explosive # dallaspdshooting dallas police depart ( @ dallaspd ) both directions of i-45 shutdown in the area of i-45 and i-20 due to on-going standoff # dallaspdshooting live are starting to filter through from agencies who have sent photographers to the area .
a selection follows¦ several bullet holes are seen in the windshield of a police patrol car in dallas , texas .
/reuters police officers use a dog while searching for explosives outside police headquarters in dallas .
/reuters armed officers walk down belleview street , one block away from police hq in dallas .
gutierrez/ap police block the intersection of dowdy ferry rd and interstate 45 .
wade/ap
when he spoke with the police earlier this morning , the suspect identified himself as james boulware .
the suspect told our negotiators that we took his child and accused him of being a terrorist and that he is going to blow us up .
then [ he ] cut off negotiations , dallas police chief david brown said at a press conference in the early morning .
we can not confirm a motive at this time .
according to the dallas morning news , a man by the name james lance boulware was arrested in 2013 .
the paper 's report said : authorities cautioned that they have not confirmed the man is who he says he is .
but in 2013 , police in paris , texas , said they arrested james lance boulware after he obtained firearms , ammunition and body armor before threatening to attack his family , churches and schools .
police said then that he was taken into custody on two felony warrants from dallas county .
however , it appears the case against him was dismissed last year after he fulfilled requirements imposed on him by a court .
during his press conference , brown reiterated that police can not confirm that boulware is the person that they are speaking with .
he did , however , confirm that the name had been previously handled by police for family violence .
so all we know is there has been a previous contact with police related to three different family violence cases .
we are continuing to follow up on the addresses that were listed during the time that we came into contact with him , said brown .
he went on to add that couple of those addresses were outside the city of dallas , and that authorities in those areas were working with the dallas police .
they were proceeding with caution , brown said , because there is a possibility that these locations might be rigged with explosives .
dallas police chief david brown speaks during a news conference at police headquarters in dallas .
otero/ap
four bags were found in front of the dallas police headquarters .
according to the dallas police , one bag was confirmed to contain pipe bombs .
an explosive ordinance robot was dispatched to move the bags found in the parking lot .
the police department just reported that the robot took a hit during an initial explosion .
it remains functional , however .
dallas police depart ( @ dallaspd ) this is where the explosive ordinance robot attempted to move one of the bags .
# dallaspdshooting dallas police depart ( @ dallaspd ) # breaking our eod robot took a hit from the initial explosion but is still functional and in use # dallaspdshooting

documents.title: summary
text: a standoff is continuing between dallas police and a suspect in an armoured vehicle after gunmen opened fire on the city 's police headquarters just after midnight .

the suspect , who has given his name as james boulware , is currently surrounded by police in a fast-food restaurant car park some 10 miles from dallas police hq after a dramatic chase involving dozens of police cars .
police chief david brown said there could have been as many as four suspects involved in the initial attack , according to witness reports .
no police have been hurt , but boulware has told police negotiators that he is injured .
following the attack , police discovered a number of suspect packages around their hq .
one exploded when a bomb-disposal robot tried to move it .
a second was detonated with a controlled explosion .
police dogs are still searching the area for more devices .
after police responded to the initial shots fired at their headquarters , the suspect identifying himself as boulware fled in the armoured van , ramming a police car and firing shots on the way .
it is believed that the van he is driving could be a vehicle sold on ebay earlier this month as a zombie apocalypse assault vehicle and troop transport .
it 's full armor plated and has bullet proof windows just in case you run into other zombie hunting hordes who might try to take this bad boy from you , the sale listing said .
police say they do not yet know the motive for the attack , but boulware is known to police .
he was arrested in 2013 after threatening to launch a killing spree against his family , churches and schools .
here is a of the scene where a bomb disposal robot attempted to move a suspect package found outside dallas police hq .
the bag exploded , but no officers were hurt .
one other suspect package has been disposed off with a controlled detonation .
officers are now scouring the site with bomb-detecting sniffer dogs to see if there are any more booby-trapped devices in the building .
dallas police depart ( @ dallaspd ) this is where the explosive ordinance robot attempted to move one of the bags .
# dallaspdshooting dallas police depart ( @ dallaspd ) our explosive detection k-9 unit is at the scene at hq .
the windscreen of a dallas police squad car is peppered with bullet holes after the attack this morning .
it 's not clear if this was the car the suspect rammed as he made his getaway from the scene .
there is as yet no update on the standoff which is still continuing in fast-food restaurant car park 10 miles away .
dallas police depart ( @ dallaspd ) picture of squad car that was shot at .
no officers were injured .
a row has broken out on twitter over whether the police have n't killed the suspect yet because he 's white .
there is also speculation that james boulware 's race is the reason the attack has not been described as terrorism .
another twitter user says it 's likely that officers have n't attacked the truck because they are afraid it is packed with explosives , rather than because of the colour of the suspect 's skin .
lls ( @ powwowasu ) sorry but we know had these people been black , that van would have already been blown up .
# blacktwitter # dallaspdshooting # dallas # dallaspd bob bob ( @ bobbob5482 ) in all the coverage i 've seen regarding the # dallaspdshooting i have not heard the word terrorism mentioned .
why ?
cynthia raymond ( @ 9f50a7fe931a48e ) the reason dpd is n't shooting up the truck could be that they believe there 's explosives in it .
not because of skin color # dallaspdshooting
dallas police have released some of the damage to their headquarters caused by the gun attack which began just after midnight local time .
according to witnesses , several gunmen opened fire on the building after pulling up in what was described as an armoured vehicle .
dallas police depart ( @ dallaspd ) here are some of the damage at hq .

documents.title: dallas police hq is now clear of suspect devices - police
text: chief david brown earlier told reporters his officers had found four suspect packages around the police station .
one exploded as officers attempted to move it with a robot .
bomb disposal experts detonated second one that was found underneath a police van .
one bag was confirmed to have contained pipe bombs , but it is not known whether this was either of the two that were detonated .
dallas police depart ( @ dallaspd ) # breaking 2 explosive devices were found @ twitterid hq - all suspected packages have now been cleared there .
# dallaspdshooting
the armoured van used in the attack on dallas police hq is believed to be a zombie apocalypse assault vehicle and troop transport sold last month by georgia-based jenco sales inc .
there is no confirmation of the link , but the van used by the dallas suspect also has a georgia licence plate .
twitter users have compared of the van used in this morning 's attack with ones on its sales listing on ebay .
scott mccullough ( @ mscottmcculloug ) definitely the same van .

# dallaspdshooting a facebook post by jenco advertising the vehicle states : this full armored zombie busting vehicle features convenient gun ports so no zombie juice touches you during a mass zombie take down .
it also has benches in the back so you can take turns resting during long zombie sieges .
the tactical step boards are installed for when you only need swords and axes for drive by mow downs .
the bumpers are made of reinforced steel tubing , so no dents from smashing zombie heads !
it 's full armor plated and has bullet proof windows just in case you run into other zombie hunting hordes who might try to take this bad boy from you .
like anything , there is a price attached to this fine piece of zombie fighting machinery .

the name given by the suspect , james boulware , is the same name as a man who was arrested in 2013 after threatening to launch a killing spree against his family , churches and schools , the dallas morning news reports .
boulware was taken into custody on two felony warrants from dallas county after he obtained firearms , ammunition and body armour , but the case against him was dismissed last year , the paper said .
bomb disposal experts have detonated the sus device found earlier beneath a police van in the car park of the dallas police headquarters .
no news yet on the sus package discovered at a nearby local police station .
dallas police depart ( @ dallaspd ) # breaking device found under police vehicle @ twitterid hq was detonated by eod .
# dallaspdshooting

documents.title: dallas swat team used high-powered rifle to disable `` armoured '' van
text: a tweet from dallas police says that officers used a.50 calibre rifle to disable the van that the attackers used in their assault on the police hq this morning .
the standoff continues at a fast-food restaurant car park in hutchins , a city about 10 miles south of dallas .
but the tweet suggests that officers have armed themselves with serious weaponry ; 50-calibre bullets are ty used in long-range sniper rifles and vehicle-mounted machine guns .
dallas police depart ( @ dallaspd ) dallas swat disabled the suspect vehicle with a.50 cal rifle .
standoff is ongoing # dallaspdshooting
a fourth video of the attack , filmed from on top of a building across the road from the police headquarters .
it shows clearly the moment that the van careened into a police car , sending two officers sheltering behind it running for safety .
the soundtrack suggests a number of people watching the incident unfold from that spot .
here is the full video of dallas police chief david brown 's meeting with reporters earlier this morning , where he told them what police knew so far about the attack .
here 's another video of the attack on dallas police hq posted to youtube , with mildly obscene narration .
there 's some shit going down right now at the police department in dallas , the cameraman says .
i 'm at the south side of lamar .
cops on the scene .
all of the fire alarms were going off inside the cop department before .
it 's like someone set off a fucking fire alarm , made all the cops come outside , and fucking attacked them , you know ?
i ai n't never seen some shit like this son .
dallas police depart ( @ dallaspd ) # breaking standoff with the suspect .
suspect vehicle has been disabled .
# dallaspdshooting

documents.title: police have found two more suspected bombs
text: dallas police say they have discovered one suspected bomb under a police van in the car park of their headquarters and a second sus package in a bin at a local station .
the discoveries follow an earlier call for all local police stations to search for bombs on their premises .
one earlier bag was found to contain pipe bombs , another exploded when a bomb disposal robot tried to move it .

dallas police depart ( @ dallaspd ) # breaking we have found an additional package under a police truck in the parking lot @ twitterid hq eod is checking it # dallaspdshooting dallas police depart ( @ dallaspd ) # breaking we are also investigating a sus package in a dumpster at the northeast substation # dallaspdshooting

reuters has filed this report of dallas police chief david brown 's comments at a press conference earlier this morning dallas police chief david brown told reporters that witnesses said as many as four suspects were involved in the incident , which began around 12:30 a.m .
he said that a motive was not yet known .
brown said when police responded to reports of automatic gunfire , the van rammed a squad car and at least one person opened fire .
the van drove off when the police returned fire and the police gave chase , brown said .
the van stopped in a fast food restaurant parking lot in the city of hutchins , some 10 miles ( 16 km ) south of dallas , where there was another exchange of gunfire .
brown said police negotiators had since been in contact with one of the suspects inside the van , who identified himself as james boulware .
brown said that the suspect had said that police had taken his son and had accused him of being a terrorist .
brown said that the man then threatened to blow us up .
four bags were found scattered around police headquarters , one of which had explosives inside , brown said .
nearby residents were being evacuated from the area , he said .
no officers have been injured , but the suspect speaking with police said he had been hurt , brown said .
dallas police have just published a summary of the key events in this morning 's attack on their headquarters by suspects in an armoured car .
on june 13 , 2015 , at approximately 12:30 a.m. , witnesses observed what they believed to be multiple suspects firing gun shots at the dallas police headquarters at 1400 south lamar street .
the suspects were parked in front of headquarters .
patrol elements arrived , at which time the suspects rammed a dallas police squad car and began shooting at officers , striking the squad cars .
there were no officers struck .
officers returned fire at which time the suspect fled the location in what witnesses say is an armored vehicle .
officers chased the suspects south of dallas to the parking lot of a jack in the box at 121 south interstate 45 service road in hutchins at approximately 12:44 a.m .
while in the parking lot , there was an exchange of gunfire between the suspects and officers .
squad cars were struck , however no officers were injured .
the suspects refused to exit the vehicle , at which time officers set up a perimeter .
swat has since been called to the scene and began negotiations with the suspects .
swat officers are currently talking to the suspects and working to find a peaceful and safe resolution .
the suspect gave a name to identify himself as james boulware , a white male , 5'10 , 200 pounds .
this is the name given , however it has not been confirmed that this is the person we are talking to .
dallas police headquarters and all seven substations are secure .
our explosives ordinance detonation unit is investigating four sus bags left in front of dallas police headquarters .
one bag is confirmed to have explosives inside , pipe bombs .
we are in process of evacuating residents of the southside on lamar complex , located at 1409 south lamar street .
no dallas police officers have been injured .
this is preliminary information and we are working diligently to gather more details regarding this incident .
after the bomb explosion at hq , dallas police major max geron is advising all nearby local police stations to search for bombs .
he has also said that dallas police are working with the fbi and the bureau of alcohol , tobacco and firearms to investigate the incident .
maj. max geron ( @ maxdpd ) we are advising all of our surrounding leo depts to search their facilities for devices and not to touch them .
# dallaspdshooting maj. max geron ( @ maxdpd ) we are working with @ twitterid and @ twitterid

documents.title: injured suspect in standoff with police on interstate 45
text: police are continuing to negotiate with at least one suspect in an armoured van after a chase that ended on interstate 45 near hutchins .
the suspect has identified himself as james boulware , 50 .
police said he has a history of family violence and blames them for losing his son .
dallas police chief david brown said earlier : as of now we do n't have any suspects injured .
during negotiations the suspect said he had been shot , but we are unable to confirm that .
it appears that the bags left around dallas police hq are booby trapped .
one exploded when officers tried to move it with a robot .
maj. max geron ( @ maxdpd ) # breaking as the explosive ordinance robot attempted to move one of the bags @ twitterid hq , the bag exploded on its own # dallaspdshooting
a second video , uploaded to youtube , shows the attack on dallas police hq from ground level .
its terse description says : 6/13/2015 midnight , armored van crashes into squad , fires on police from gun slots , man on street , close call .
in a press conference streamed online by dallas police chief david brown told reporters that witnesses said as many as four suspects were involved in the incident .
he also said there were four bags spread throughout dallas police hq , at least one of which has been confirmed to contain pipe bombs .
paddynation ( @ paddynation ) total of 4 bags spread throughout @ twitterid hq .
1 back confirmed with pipe bombs .
- @ twitterid @ twitterid police said that no officers had been injured , and that they were still negotiating with a suspect inside the van at a fast food parking lot south of dallas .
he has told them his name is james boulware .
this suspect blames us for losing his child , brown said .
dallas police depart ( @ dallaspd ) the suspect gave a name to identify himself as james boulware , a white male , 5'10 , 200 pounds .
a video posted on twitter shows the moment during the chase that the van driven by the suspects rams a dallas police car .
officers can be seen fleeing their vehicle before colleagues open fire with a volley of shots as the van reverses and speeds off in another direction .
madhu ( @ madwho12 ) armored van lured police , fired upon , and rammed police
parts of central dallas are on lockdown this morning after shots were fired at the city 's police headquarters from what witnesses said was an armoured vehicle .
gunmen arrived outside the building at about 12.30 am local time and rammed a police car before opening fire with fully automatic weapons , a police spokesman said .
the suspects then made off in the van , with dozens of police cars and swat teams in pursuit .
the chase ended on a nearby interstate highway where officers are apparently negotiating with the driver .
no police officers have been hurt , but the driver of the van told negotiators he has been injured , police said .
it is understood that there are fears that the suspects are carrying explosives .

in a video on social media and also published online by local media , a police officer could be seen approaching a black van with a flashlight as two other police cruisers pulled up behind the vehicle .
the officer then abruptly turned and ran away and then a volley of gunshots could be heard .
in another video , the van could be seen ramming a police cruiser before gunfire rang out and the vehicle drove off .

No officers were injured in early morning attack.
